title: How to end a letter without saying love - Quora

response.answer_text: Say things like (Blah blah blah ending to the letter) Sincerely, *your name* Sincerely can also be replaced with other things. Like “thank you, best wishes, see you soon, regards, etc”. There's an endless amount of ways to do it. If you need more or a different one, consult Google. Best wishes, Nathan L
